arabic.title: اعمل حاجة
text: انا قلبى فاق من الى كان فيه

english.title: do something
text: Do something to make me feel
that u once have loved me
Do something to remind me of u
Or that's over and u forgot me
I was living my days for u
These days I wish I've never lived
But now I don't find anything to love u for
U'll see, I'll be over u soon
so tell me what do u have
My heart transcend what it had
And now it just knew u
I'll live and die regretting because
I loved ur eyes and I adored ur heart
I'll forget ur love day after day
Why will i live 4 u again?
I lived years losing with u
What do u want me to do for u again?
U'll see, I'll be over u soon
so tell me what do u have

arabic.title: عاشق بحب
text: إحساس بأجمل معنى فى عنيك هزنى
ولقيت فى حُبك شوق حنانه شدنى
كان أحلى حاجه فى عمري قلبى حسها
آه بحـــبك آه بموت من شوقى ليك
انت اللى بيك عرفتني نفسى ودنيتى
وافرح معاك فرحه فى حياتى ما شفتها
آه بحـــبك آه بموت من شوقى ليك

english.title: I'm a lover who loves
text: A feeling with a great meaning in your eyes,
Made me forget my soul, and a life I lived before you
And I found in your love longing, its tenderness attracted me
Was the best thing in my life, that my heart felt
my eyes saying (it) to your eyes
my heart spells the meanings of your love
ah I die from my longing passion for you
With you , myself and my world knew me
Your the safety, tenderness, and love of my soul
I draw with the light of your eyes the features of my laugh
And I embrace with you a happiness that I've never felt in my life

arabic.title: معاه قلبي
text: ودا من حال بيبقى فى حال
ودا من حال بيبقى فى حال

english.title: Ma3ah 2alby
text: my heart is with him and it's melting in him
and my soul went from me to him
and sometime he hides them from me
why is he taking it slow?
from where i supposed to get comfort
he goes from one state to another
he has speech in his eyes ,although,he hides
where i can't find her love
tender one day and the other day he's cruel
and i peg him nights and nights
from where i supposed to get comfort
he goes from one state to another
he has speech in his eyes ,although,he hides
where i can't find her love
tender one day and the other day he's cruel
and i peg him nights and nights
my heart is no longer in a good shape
i'm carrying him inside of me
and i peg him,he's beside you but i can't reach him
wana bel leila we el leilteen ba7ayel feeh.
from where i supposed to get comfort
he goes from one state to another
he has speech in his eyes ,although,he hides
where i can't find her love
tender one day and the other day he's cruel
and i peg him nights and nights
